content.raw:
The problem is in the model, in the``` walkway_metal.mtl ``` file,

it is pointing to a wrong path for the textures.  
```
 	map_Ka walkway.png
	map_Kd walkway.png
``` 

should be 
```
 	map_Ka ../materials/textures/map_Ka walkway.png
	map_Kd ../materials/textures/map_Kd walkway.png
```
content.html:
The problem is in the model, in thewalkway_metal.mtl file,

it is pointing to a wrong path for the textures. 

    map_Ka walkway.png
    map_Kd walkway.png

should be 

    map_Ka ../materials/textures/map_Ka walkway.png
    map_Kd ../materials/textures/map_Kd walkway.png
